channel.title: Battlefield 2 clan recreuitment
channel.description:
Anyone interested in joining a battlefield 2 clan?
It's so easy to join. Here are the steps: 1. Goto www.greatwallofgaming.com 2. Enter the Forums 3. register 4. Scroll down to the 'GWOG Australian BF2 Clan' section 5. Goto the recruitment section 6. Ask to be in the clan 7. wait for about a day or less 8. And you are done. 9. Now visit the website again after a day or so and get told when to put the tag on and you will be welcomed.
We all stay together never letting a soilder behind. We all co-operate with mics to enhance the battle. We learn eachother as we fight and we always... always have a good time...
At the moment we only have a few people, hoping we can recruit more, I, as a captain of GWOG, join this forum to Recruit people who are finding a clan to join. So why not join ours? we have friendly members and a forum to chat to eachother.
well ive done my talking, its up to you guys to join the squad
Cheers[br][size=1]Posted at: October 14, 2006, 08:21:46 AM[/size][hr]gdgdgddfgdgdg

item.title: Battlefield 2 clan recreuitment
item.dc:creator: @imwifloser imwifloser
item.description:
@imwifloser wrote:

Anyone interested in joining a battlefield 2 clan?

It’s so easy to join. Here are the steps:

  1. Goto www.greatwallofgaming.com
  2. Enter the Forums
  3. register
  4. Scroll down to the ‘GWOG Australian BF2 Clan’ section
  5. Goto the recruitment section
  6. Ask to be in the clan
  7. wait for about a day or less
  8. And you are done.
  9. Now visit the website again after a day or so and get told when to put the tag on and you will be welcomed.

We all stay together never letting a soilder behind. We all co-operate with mics to enhance the battle. We learn eachother as we fight and we always… always have a good time…

At the moment we only have a few people, hoping we can recruit more, I, as a captain of GWOG, join this forum to Recruit people who are finding a clan to join. So why not join ours? we have friendly members and a forum to chat to eachother.

well ive done my talking, its up to you guys to join the squad

Cheers[br][size=1]Posted at: October 14, 2006, 08:21:46 AM[/size][hr]gdgdgddfgdgdg
